name: Claim AIA on qualifying plant and machinery
why: Assets like machinery and office equipment may qualify for Annual Investment Allowance
how_to_do_it: Claim 100% of the cost in your capital allowances section

name: Check Employment Allowance eligibility
why: If you have employees, you may reduce your NIC liability
how_to_do_it: Claim Employment Allowance via your PAYE software

name: R&D Tax Relief
why: Businesses developing new products, processes, or services may qualify for R&D relief
how_to_do_it: Include R&D costs in your Corporation Tax return to claim relief

name: Home Office Expenses
why: If you work from home, you may claim a portion of household expenses

name: Mileage Allowance Relief
why: You can claim mileage allowance for business travel in a personal vehicle
